name: jp.cukr2675.save2idb
description:
Provides a wrapper of System.IO.FileStream for WebGL build.

This package requires:
- System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe (NuGet)

samples.description:
Sample scene.
This sample requires UnitySimpleFileBrowser (git: https://github.com/yasirkula/UnitySimpleFileBrowser.git) .
